thread.title: H&M online growth gives investors fresh hope

title: H&M online growth gives investors fresh hope
text:
H&M online growth gives investors fresh hope Wednesday, February 14, 2018 - 01:28 
Sweden's H&M expects earnings to grow this year as rising online sales offset weakness in its physical stores, it said on Wednesday at its first ever day of investor briefings, held to assuage concerns over future strategy.   
Sweden's H&M expects earnings to grow this year as rising online sales offset weakness in its physical stores, it said on Wednesday at its first ever day of investor briefings, held to assuage concerns over future strategy.  //reut.rs/2EJ8RTn
